Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

About

    DCLA Materials For The Arts - Donor Information

    Data regarding donations processed through Materials For The Arts (MFTA).

    Operating and energy support funding provided to members of the cultural institution group (CIG).

    DCA Fines and Fees

    All fees charged by DCA for services and, all fines issued by an administrative judge resulting from violations.
